title: Jest V6 Setting
markdownDescription: Schema for validating the new v6 settings in vscode. See details in [settings](https://github.com/jest-community/vscode-jest#customization)

jest.runMode.markdownDescription: Control when and how jest tests should be run. See details in [runMode](https://github.com/jest-community/vscode-jest#runmode)

oneOf.markdownDescription: A predefined Jest run mode. See details in [runMode](https://github.com/jest-community/vscode-jest#runmode)

type.description: Specifies the jest run mode type.

runAllTestsOnStartup.description: Specifies whether to run all tests on startup.

coverage.description: Specifies whether to collect and report coverage information.

showInlineError.description: Specify if to enable inline error display in test file editor

deferred.description: Specifies whether the run mode is deferred.

testFileOnly.description: if true, will run tests only when saving test files.

else.errorMessage: The property 'testFileOnly' should only be present when 'type' is 'on-save'.

oneOf.markdownDescription: A detailed runMode configuration. See details in [runMode](https://github.com/jest-community/vscode-jest#runmode)

jest.outputConfig.markdownDescription: Control jest output preference. See details in [output](https://github.com/jest-community/vscode-jest#output)

enumDescriptions: Reveal the output upon test run.
Reveal the output upon test error.
revalOn.description: Determines when to reveal the test run output. Default is 'run'.

enumDescriptions: Do not change focus when revealing output.
Reveal test results panel with focus.
revealWithFocus.description: Specifies which output panel, if any, to shift focus to when revealing. Default is 'none'.

enumDescriptions: Do not automatically clear the output before each run.
Clear both the terminal and test results output before each run.
Clear the terminal output before each run.
Clear the test results output before each run.
clearOnRun.description: Specifies which output, if any, to be cleared before each run. Default is 'none'.
